Title: Enacts the  police and fire employees retention act
Summary: Enacts the "police and fire employees retention act"; provides for a deferred retirement option plan payable to members of optional twenty-year retirement plans; outlines eligibility and payout of such plan; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง381-c, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to enacting the "police and fire employees retention act"
